set.name: DMBD-10 Ultimate Chronicle Deck 2019: SSS! Invasion Dead Disaster

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ S-Rank Invasion "Zombie": Darkness Command (When one of your Darkness Commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand or graveyard onto it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -9000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-10 Ultimate Chronicle Deck 2019: SSS! Invasion Dead Disaster

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Trinity Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your water, darkness or nature creatures. ■ SSS-Rank Invasion "Disaster": Water, Darkness or Nature Command (When one of your Water, Darkness or Nature Commands attack, you may put this card from the battle zone, your hand, graveyard or mana zone onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature onto another creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's graveyard or mana zone or return it to their hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-10 Ultimate Chronicle Deck 2019: SSS! Invasion Dead Disaster

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Demon Command

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may summon this creature from your graveyard. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.

property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number and your opponent's creatures that cost the same can't attack or block.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Dark Lord

property.name: Rules
Set
property.value: DMBD-10 Ultimate Chronicle Deck 2019: SSS! Invasion Dead Disaster

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SUPER SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost. Then if you have no shields, you may use this card's Super Shield Trigger ability.) ■ When you put this creature, use the next ability 3 times: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {SUPER}: When you put this creature, put any number of creatures that cost 4 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-10 Ultimate Chronicle Deck 2019: SSS! Invasion Dead Disaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Return all your opponent's cards that cost 5 or less in the battle zone to their owner's hand: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or more.

property.name: Set

property.value: Demon Command/Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. {INVASION}-Darkness creature that costs 3 or more (When one of your darkness creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard.
